mapper.delete: DELETE FROM category WHERE no = #{no} AND user_no = ( SELECT no from users where id = #{id} )
mapper.select: SELECT c.no, c.name, (select count(*) from post p where user_no = u.no and p.category_no=c.no) as postCount, c.description FROM category c, users u WHERE u.id = #{userId} AND u.no = c.user_no
